trans-unit.resname: ORI·67 | Psychic Rebuttal | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Counter target instant or sorcery spell that targets you.\nSpell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you may copy the spell countered this way. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标瞬间或法术咒语，且该咒语须以你为目标。精熟咒语～如果你坟墓场中有两张或更多的瞬间和／或法术牌，则你可以复制以此法被反击的咒语。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.source: "I know what you're thinking," Jace whispered in the mage's mind. "It's not going to work."
trans-unit.target: 「我知道你在想什么，」杰斯的声音在法师的心灵中飘荡。「没用。」

trans-unit.source: "As long as each side thinks it can win, the balance holds, and the mage-rings stand."\n—Alhammarret

trans-unit.source: Infernal Scarring

trans-unit.resname: ORI·102 | Infernal Scarring | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has "When this creature dies, draw a card."
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物所结附的生物得+2/+0且具有「当此生物死去时，抓一张牌。」

trans-unit.source: One who is marked by a demon in life is sure to be remembered as one in death.
trans-unit.target: 生前得恶魔印记者，死后亦被以恶魔相待。

trans-unit.source: Infinite Obliteration
trans-unit.target: 无限抹灭

trans-unit.resname: ORI·103 | Infinite Obliteration | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Name a creature card. Search target opponent's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 说出一个生物牌的名称。从目标对手的坟墓场，手牌及牌库中搜寻任意数量具该名称的牌，并将它们放逐。然后该牌手将其牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: ORI·104 | Kothophed, Soul Hoarder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kothophed, Soul Hoarder
trans-unit.target: 贮魂恶魔柯索非

trans-unit.resname: ORI·104 | Kothophed, Soul Hoarder | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever a permanent owned by another player is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行每当一个由其他牌手拥有的永久物从战场进入坟墓场时，你抓一张牌且你失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: ORI·104 | Kothophed, Soul Hoarder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I will be your most demanding master, Liliana. But I have great things in mind for you."
trans-unit.target: 「我会是你最苛刻的主人，莉莲娜。但我对你有很高的期望。」

trans-unit.source: Languish
trans-unit.target: 衰萎

trans-unit.source: All creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 所有生物得-4/-4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Life is such a fragile thing.
trans-unit.target: 生命就是如此脆弱。

trans-unit.resname: ORI·106 | Liliana, Heretical Healer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Liliana, Heretical Healer
trans-unit.target: 异端治疗师莉莲娜

trans-unit.resname: ORI·106 | Liliana, Heretical Healer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Lifelink\nWhenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile CARDNAME, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control. If you do, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 系命每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，放逐CARDNAME，然后将她在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。若你如此作，则将一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: ORI·106 | Liliana, Defiant Necromancer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Liliana, Defiant Necromancer
trans-unit.target: 无畏死灵术士莉莲娜

trans-unit.source: +2: Each player discards a card.−X: Return target nonlegendary creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield.−8: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature dies, return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step."
trans-unit.target: +2：每位牌手各弃一张牌。−X：将目标总法术力费用为X且非传奇的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。−8：你获得具有「每当一个生物死去，在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它在你的操控下移回战场」的徽记。

trans-unit.source: Macabre Waltz
trans-unit.target: 亡者华尔滋

trans-unit.source: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 将至多两张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "All dead move to the hollow rhythm of necromancy."\n—Savra
trans-unit.target: 「所有亡者都随死灵术的空荡旋律起舞。」～撒芙儿

trans-unit.source: Malakir Cullblade
trans-unit.target: 马拉奇汰锋手

trans-unit.target: 每当一个由对手操控的生物死去时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Each cut stains his blade with fresh blood that he samples to increase his strength.
trans-unit.target: 每挥一刀都让他的刀刃染上鲜血，正好让他品尝以增强力量。

trans-unit.source: Nantuko Husk
trans-unit.target: 空壳螳人

trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物：CARDNAME得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "The soul sheds light, and death is its shadow. When the light dims, life and death embrace."\n—Nantuko teaching
trans-unit.target: 「灵魂发散光芒，死亡为其暗影。光芒渐微之时，生与死终结合。」～螳人教诲

trans-unit.source: Necromantic Summons
trans-unit.target: 死灵式召唤

trans-unit.source: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.\nSpell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, that creature enters the battlefield with two additional +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌在你的操控下从坟墓场放进战场。精熟咒语～如果你坟墓场中有两张或更多的瞬间和／或法术牌，则该生物进战场时上面额外有两个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Nightsnare
trans-unit.target: 深夜圈套

trans-unit.source: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player discards that card. If you don't, that player discards two cards.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手展示其手牌。你可以选择其中一张非地牌。如果你如此作，则该牌手弃掉该牌。如果你未如此作，则该牌手弃两张牌。

trans-unit.source: Ravnica would be safer if mere coin was all the Dimir could steal.
trans-unit.target: 如果底密尔只能偷钱币，拉尼卡会安全得多。

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将一个5/5黑色，具飞行异能的恶魔衍生生物放进战场。在你的维持开始时，你失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: ORI·112 | Priest of the Blood Rite | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some will sacrifice everything for but a taste of power.
trans-unit.target: 有人愿意舍弃一切，只为品尝力量的滋味。

trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each player loses 2 life.

trans-unit.source: She haunts the streets, wings spread wide, with carrion on her breath and blood in her eyes.

trans-unit.target: 解读骨卦

trans-unit.target: 占卜2，然后抓两张牌。你失去2点生命。（占卜2的流程是检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.source: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.

trans-unit.source: Driven away by his living kin, he wanders mourning through the wilderness, seeking the dead city of Asphodel.
trans-unit.target: 被在世的亲属赶走后，他悲伤地在旷野间徘徊，寻找死城安福陵。

trans-unit.source: Chandra, Roaring Flame
trans-unit.target: 咆哮烈焰茜卓

trans-unit.resname: ORI·135 | Chandra, Roaring Flame | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: +1: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to target player.−2: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to target creature.−7: CARDNAME deals 6 damage to each opponent. Each player dealt damage this way gets an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 3 damage to you."
trans-unit.target: +1：CARDNAME对目标牌手造成2点伤害。−2：CARDNAME对目标生物造成2点伤害。−7：CARDNAME向每位对手各造成6点伤害。以此法受到伤害的每位牌手均获得具有「在你的维持开始时，此徽记对你造成3点伤害」的徽记。

trans-unit.source: Chandra's Fury
trans-unit.target: 茜卓的怒火

trans-unit.resname: ORI·136 | Chandra's Fury | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target player and 1 damage to each creature that player controls.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标牌手造成4点伤害，且对每个由该牌手操控的生物各造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "They started it."
trans-unit.target: 「他们先惹我的。」

trans-unit.source: Chandra's Ignition
trans-unit.target: 茜卓扬焰

trans-unit.resname: ORI·137 | Chandra's Ignition | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to each other creature and each opponent.
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物向每个其他生物和每位对手各造成伤害，其数量等同于该生物的力量。

trans-unit.source: In the moment before her execution, she realized what it meant to be a pyromancer, to be alive, to be Chandra.
trans-unit.target: 在她将被处决的那一刻，她才明白身为烈焰术士的意义，活着的意义，以及身为茜卓的意义。

trans-unit.source: Cobblebrute
trans-unit.target: 鹅卵石蛮汉

trans-unit.source: Ravnica's most ancient streets take on a life of their own. A few have decided to move to nicer neighborhoods.
trans-unit.target: 拉尼卡最古老的街道开始有了自己的生命。其中一些决定搬到比较好的街坊。

trans-unit.source: Demolish
trans-unit.target: 毁坏

trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact or land.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器或地。

trans-unit.source: Nothing of nature nor of mortals can stand forever.
trans-unit.target: 自然和凡人的一切都无法永存。

trans-unit.source: Dragon Fodder
trans-unit.target: 巨龙食粮

trans-unit.resname: ORI·140 | Dragon Fodder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 将两个1/1红色鬼怪衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪前往牺牲山峰的旅程总是两两结伴同行，好让极幸运的生还者能讲述另一人的悲惨死法。

trans-unit.source: Embermaw Hellion
trans-unit.target: 烬喉地狱兽

trans-unit.resname: ORI·141 | Embermaw Hellion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)\nIf another red source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 1 to that permanent or player instead.
trans-unit.target: 践踏（此生物攻击时造成之过量战斗伤害能对防御牌手或鹏洛客造成之。）如果由你操控的其他红色来源将对任一永久物或牌手造成伤害，则改为它对该永久物或牌手造成原数量加1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Enthralling Victor
trans-unit.target: 威服英豪

trans-unit.resname: ORI·142 | Enthralling Victor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power 2 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，获得目标由对手操控且力量等于或小于2的生物之操控权直到回合结束。重置该生物。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。（它此回合便能攻击与{T}。）

trans-unit.source: If you stare at the sun for too long, you'll lose your ability to see clearly.
trans-unit.target: 若你瞪视太阳太久，就会失去看清一切的能力。

trans-unit.source: Exquisite Firecraft
trans-unit.target: 精巧火术

trans-unit.resname: ORI·143 | Exquisite Firecraft | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature or player.\nSpell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, CARDNAME can't be countered by spells or abilities.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成4点伤害。精熟咒语～如果你坟墓场中有两张或更多的瞬间和／或法术牌，则CARDNAME不能被咒语或异能反击。

trans-unit.source: Chandra's gift set her apart and others aflame.
trans-unit.target: 茜卓的天赋让她孑然独立，使他人着火燃烧。

trans-unit.source: Fiery Conclusion
trans-unit.target: 暴烈终局

trans-unit.resname: ORI·144 | Fiery Conclusion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast CARDNAME, sacrifice a creature.CARDNAME deals 5 damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放CARDNAME的额外费用。CARDNAME对目标生物造成5点伤害。

trans-unit.source: The Boros legionnaire saw a noble sacrifice, the Rakdos thug a blazing suicide, and the Izzet alchemist an experiment gone awry.
trans-unit.target: 波洛斯军团兵见证了高贵的牺牲，拉铎司刺客看到了眩目的自杀场面，伊捷炼金术士则认为是实验出了差错。

trans-unit.source: Fiery Impulse
trans-unit.target: 暴烈冲动

trans-unit.resname: ORI·145 | Fiery Impulse | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to target creature.\nSpell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, CARDNAME deals 3 damage to that creature instead.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物造成2点伤害。精熟咒语～如果你坟墓场中有两张或更多的瞬间和／或法术牌，则改为CARDNAME对该生物造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Well, this got out of hand."
trans-unit.target: 「好吧，这失控了。」

trans-unit.source: Firefiend Elemental
trans-unit.target: 炎魔元素

trans-unit.source: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)\nRenown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
trans-unit.target: 敏捷（此生物受你操控时便能攻击与{T}。）铭勇1（当此生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，若它未铭勇，则在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物且它已铭勇。）

trans-unit.source: Flameshadow Conjuring
trans-unit.target: 召现焰影

trans-unit.resname: ORI·147 | Flameshadow Conjuring | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {R}. If you do, put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of that creature. That token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个非衍生物的生物在你的操控下进战场时，你可以支付{R}。若你如此作，将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为该生物的复制品。该衍生物获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: ORI·148 | Ghirapur Aether Grid | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 吉拉波乙太网

trans-unit.resname: ORI·148 | Ghirapur Aether Grid | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The city of Ghirapur is a living thing, and living things defend themselves.
trans-unit.target: 吉拉波城是活的，而活物会自我防御。

trans-unit.source: The metal must be pure. The hand must be steady. The product must be perfect.
trans-unit.target: 金属必须纯净；双手必须稳当；产品必须完美。

trans-unit.target: 逐耀鬼怪

trans-unit.target: 铭勇1（当此生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，若它未铭勇，则在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物且它已铭勇。）只要CARDNAME已铭勇，它便具有威慑异能。（它只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.target: 结附于生物所结附的生物得+2/+1，具有敏捷异能，且每回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。当所结附的生物死去时，你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张名称为CARDNAME的牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: The harpies descended without mercy upon Akros, only to find their attack put them within range of the javelineers.

trans-unit.source: "Don't be rude, Beleren. We just want to enjoy the view with you."

trans-unit.source: If you can't take the heat . . . well, that's going to be a problem.

trans-unit.source: In time, not even the fire monks could keep up with Chandra.

trans-unit.source: Vastwood Gorger
trans-unit.target: 广林吞食客

trans-unit.source: "A long and difficult incision revealed that all vital organs are housed in the head, save for a long chain of stomachs, forty in all, leading from its throat to the end of the tail."\n—Mulak Ffar, *Vastwood Biodiversity*
trans-unit.target: 「作出狭长棘手的切口后，展现出一个事实：所有重要器官都囊括在其头部之中，除却它长链般的胃外～整整四十个，从其咽喉排至尾尖。」～穆拉法，《广林生物多样性》

trans-unit.target: 妮莎发现沼地的藤蔓能像树林的一样捕获猎物，甚至还更好用。

trans-unit.source: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.

trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物单独攻击时，你每操控一个其他生物，它便得+1/+1直到回合结束。佩带{1}（{1}：装备在目标由你操控的生物上。佩带的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: "I've broken three swords, eighteen lances, and countless shields, but this little blade has survived every battle, just like I have."
